Text: Thomas Cook was brought down by a $2.1 billion debt pile, built up by a series of ill-fated deals, that hobbled its response to nimble online rivals.
Cause: a series of ill-fated deals, that hobbled its response to nimble online rivals.
Effect: Thomas Cook was brought down by a $2.1 billion debt pile
Sentence: <e2>Thomas Cook was brought down by a $2.1 billion debt pile</e2>, built up by <e1>a series of ill-fated deals, that hobbled its response to nimble online rivals.</e1>
